description: This file defines the declaration of the LocalStore class which implements the ILocalStore interface. It provides methods for managing a local database, including opening the database, creating tables, setting limits, retrieving entry counts and entries, removing entries, and adding entries. The class uses a DatabaseConnection and is part of the WPEFramework::Plugin namespace.

classes.name: LocalStore
classes.description: Implements ILocalStore interface to handle local data storage operations on a SQLite database.

methods.name: Open
methods.description: Opens a database connection at the specified file path.

methods.name: CreateTable
methods.description: Creates a new table in the database.

methods.name: SetLimit
methods.description: Sets a limit on the number of entries in a specified table.

methods.name: GetEntriesCount
methods.description: Retrieves the count of entries within a range in a table.

methods.name: GetEntries
methods.description: Retrieves a list of entries from a table starting at a specific index.

methods.name: RemoveEntries
methods.description: Removes entries from a table within a specified range.

methods.name: AddEntry
methods.description: Adds a new entry to a specified table.
